original_text: And you shall eat and be full, and you shall bless the Lord your God for the good land he has given you.
korean_text: 네가 먹어서 배부르고 네 하나님 여호와께서 옥토를 네게 주셨음으로 말미암아 그를 찬송하리라

sentences.original_text: And you shall eat and be full
and you shall bless the Lord your God
for the good land he has given you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 네게 주신 좋은 땅 때문에
